answers.answer: You're more likely to get gestational diabetes that way, but honestly I worked as a cashier for my first pregnancy and NEVER brought my own snack for my break, so I ate like 2 candy bars a day with him like 4-5 times a week haha, he turned out perfectly healthy. All things are okay in moderation.

question: Ive been craving swedish berries and chocolate bars all the time and eating them a bit, is it bad to eat these kind of things, cuz thats all I want ??? :$
title: sweets craiings??
